description: Multi-face pine wood log texture - concentric rings for top/bottom, vertical grain for sides

texture_properties.note: 16x16 multi-face wood texture with darker pine coloring

top.description: Concentric ring pattern for top face (tree rings)

bottom.description: Same ring pattern as top face

sides.description: Vertical grain pattern for side faces (bark)

base_colors.note: Dark pine colors for sides: r = 80 + woodGrain * 40 * ringEffect
Slightly lighter pine colors for top rings: r = 90 + ringPattern * 35

steps: 1. Calculate vertical wood grain: woodGrain = sin(globalY * 1.5) * 0.5 + 0.5
2. Calculate ring effect: ringX = globalX % texturePixelSize, ringEffect = sin(ringX * 0.7) * 0.4 + 0.6
3. Apply base colors with grain and ring effects:
4. Check for knots: if distance to center < 3 AND (tileX + tileY) % 3 == 0:
- Apply knot color adjustments: r-=15, g-=10, b-=5

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded pine wood log texture
metadata.complexity: Wood grain pattern with darker pine coloring and knot placement

differences_from_regular_wood.colors: Much darker base colors (80,50,20) vs regular wood (~120,80,40)
differences_from_regular_wood.appearance: Darker, more realistic pine wood look
differences_from_regular_wood.algorithm: Same vertical grain with knots pattern but different color parameters
